Eljestwhere A weblog by Nicklas de León Persson

Freaky Friday

28 Mar 2014

Transitioning yet again from one platform to another—it is almost like someone collecting typewriters or exquisite pencils instead of actually writing—I’ve now settled, for the time being on a Jekyll site with some Octopress sprinkles (just the rake tasks) and, again for the time being, with a Hyde theme.

Next steps would be to import old entries from Movable Type (one of the reasons for choosing Jekyll is the handy importer), figure out how to open newly created posts in Vim (note to self: must try system “vim #entry_name). And maybe at some point, I’d actually get on with some writing too.

< Tattoo Time | Waking early >
